question: You want to trigger some of the jobs whenever there is some action on git repo code and want to set git webhook, what setting needs to be done on repo settings?
option_1: In Webhooks enter payload URL as 'JenkinsIP:8080/git-webhook/'
option_2: In Webhooks enter payload URL as 'JenkinsIP:8080/github-webhook/'
option_3: In Webhooks enter payload URL as 'JenkinsIP:8080/github-hook/'
option_4: In Webhooks enter payload URL as 'JenkinsIP:8080/git-hook/'
